name: Decompiling an APK file
description: Decompile an APK file with apktool.

name: Recompiling an APK file
description: Recompile an APK file with apktool.

name: Signing an APK file
description: Sign an APK file with Uber's apksigner.

name: Injecting frida-gadget into an APK file (rootless)
description: Patch the apk with frida-gadget for dynamic instrumentation. It requires apktool (non -dirty version), apksigner and zipalign. Then, use 'objection explore' to connect to the app after installing it.
